resources.string: "To request a ride, please fill in the following fields."
"Do you have a Sac State OneCard?"
"Are you located within 10 miles of Sac State?"
"Is your destination within 10 miles of Sac State?"
"How many people are in your group?"
"OK, we just need you to confirm the following information. "
"If the information was not correct, please hit the Back button " "and correct the information before sending request."

"Safe Rides is an Associated Students Inc. program that provides free, " "safe, and confidential rides home to the students, staff, and faculty of Sac State." "

The Safe Rides Program is designed to prevent incidents related to drinking and " "driving that lead to accidents, DUI/DWI arrests, and death. However, Safe Rides " "is also a safety net. It can be used in many different situations. For instance, " "Safe Rides can be used to get home from a bad date, a late movie, or a broken down car." "

Safe Rides operates from September through May on Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and " "Saturday nights from 10 p.m. to 2 a.m. All that is needed is a valid Sac State One Card." "

You can call during our hours of operation to request a ride or if you have any " "questions call to (916) 278-TAXI (8294)."

"				September through May 
				Wednesday-Saturday nights from 10pm-2am" "

*Safe Rides does not operate during official holidays/breaks during " "the semester (ex. Thanksgiving, Spring Break, etc)."

"Welcome, please enter your name and Sac State ID to be entered " "into the system as a driver for Safe Rides this evening." "\n\nYou will only be registered if you have already completed the process " "with the Safe Rides Coordinator."

"If you click the button, you are requesting that the ride be canceled. If you " "cancel the current Ride Request, you will have to fill out the form to request " "another ride." "\n\nAre you sure you wish to cancel this Ride Request?"
